scripts.local:clean: rimraf docker-compose.yml subgraph.yaml src/utils/helpers.ts build/ generated/ data/
scripts.local:codegen: cross-env NETWORK=local npm run mustache && graph codegen
scripts.local:deploy: graph deploy --product hosted-service spool/core-v2 subgraph.yaml --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 -l 1.0
scripts.local:deploy:fresh: npm run local:build && npm run local:create && graph deploy --product hosted-service spool/core-v2 subgraph.yaml --ipfs http://localhost:5001 --node http://127.0.0.1:8020 -l 1.0
scripts.testnet:codegen: cross-env NETWORK=testnet-5 npm run mustache && graph codegen
scripts.testnet:deploy: graph deploy --product hosted-service spool/core-v2 subgraph.yaml --ipfs http://35.159.49.24:5001 --node http://35.159.49.24:8020 -l 1.0
scripts.testnet:deploy-all: npm run testing:build && npm run testing:create && npm run testing:deploy
scripts.mainnet-staging:codegen: cross-env NETWORK=mainnet.staging npm run mustache && graph codegen
scripts.mainnet-staging:deploy-satsuma: npm run mainnet-staging:build && npm run deploy-satsuma spool-v2-staging
scripts.mainnet-prod:codegen: cross-env NETWORK=mainnet.production npm run mustache && graph codegen
scripts.mainnet-prod:deploy-satsuma: npm run mainnet-prod:build && npm run deploy-satsuma spool-v2
scripts.mainnet-prod:deploy-studio: npm run mainnet-prod:build && npm run deploy-studio spool-v2_mainnet
scripts.full-deployment: npm run staging:deploy-all && npm run testing:deploy-all && npm run mainnet-staging:deploy-satsuma && npm run mainnet-prod:deploy-satsuma && npm run mainnet-prod:deploy-studio
